abstract: The dispute centered on a meeting held in Amman, the Jordanian capital, by 11 Iraqi Sunni groups, including some that are actively fighting the Iraqi government.

abstract: African migrants said they camped out for months to study the border guards' patterns as they prepared to scale the fences and enter Europe.

abstract: American and European air safety officials said Israel had taken adequate safety precautions to allow flights to resume.

abstract: While researchers pursue high-cost remedies for rare ailments, development of broadly useful drugs like antibiotics is lagging.
